title: Kommentatorskolen
overview: Impersonator king Kasper Foss's big dream is to become a real football commentator. In this series, we follow Kasper's journey towards the big baptism of fire: his very own match in the Obosligaen. On the way, Kasper seeks out several of his own idols in the field. What is in the DNA of a solid sports commentator? And what must Kasper take with him if he is to live his dream?
